channel.title: CVE Feed for Sony Corporation -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Sony Corporation -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-20793|2024-08-03T17:53:22.532Z -- sony%20corporation -- the%20installers%20of%20multiple%20sony%20products
item.description: Untrusted search path vulnerability in the installer of Sony Audio USB Driver V1.10 and prior and the installer of HAP Music Transfer Ver.1.3.0 and prior allows an attacker to gain privileges and execute arbitrary code via a Trojan horse DLL in an unspecified directory.

item.title: CVE-2022-41796|2024-08-03T12:49:44.008Z -- sony%20corporation -- content%20transfer%20%28for%20windows%29
item.description: Untrusted search path vulnerability in the installer of Content Transfer (for Windows) Ver.1.3 and prior allows an attacker to gain privileges via a Trojan horse DLL in an unspecified directory.
